title: 2020: Injection
description: Imagine a world where religion, politics, entertainment, and consumerism do not exist. A new world order has come. Society as we know it is no longer. Color and gender do not exist. Now we are equal. We are all the same. But how did we get here?It happens by rewiring the human brain, ridding it of complicated emotions, preferences, and inclinations for nonconformity.But Alexandra, she isn't lost yet. Instead, she finds herself thrust into a war she didn't know existed, with a new purpose in life to protect and defend, and right the many wrongs that have been revealed to her.She's unsure of who she can trust.And maybe most importantly, who is the true enemy?
author: Ashley McCoury
